document_data.name: ''Arrow of Salving''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Arrows of salving''''' were a type of [[arrow]] imbued with curative magics.
document_data.Description: An ''arrow of salving'' had a strange orb for its [[arrowhead]] that contained a type of fizzling and soothing balm well known for its curative properties. When the arrow met its target, it unleashed the balm locked in its arrowhead, treating and alleviating such conditions as [[poison]], [[paralysis]], and [[blindness]].
document_data.History: Such arrows were known to be found around the [[Western Heartlands]] and the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Esther]], an adventuring agent of the [[Society of Brilliance]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
* [[Talli]], a [[Harper]] quartermaster who followed the [[High Harper]] [[Jaheira]] into the [[Shadow-cursed Lands]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
